mapper.insert: insert into APART_INFO_ETC (INFO_ETC_NUM, INFO_ETC_SUB, INFO_ETC_VISIT, INFO_ETC_DATE, INFO_ETC_FILE, INFO_ETC_CONT, INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL) values (INFO_ETC_num_seq.nextval, #{INFO_ETC_SUB}, 0, SYSDATE, #{INFO_ETC_FILE , jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{INFO_ETC_CONT}, #{INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL , jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum,INFO_ETC_NUM,Admin_no,INFO_ETC_SUB,INFO_ETC_VISIT,INFO_ETC_DATE,INFO_ETC_FILE,INFO_ETC_CONT,INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL from (select rownum rnum,INFO_ETC_NUM,Admin_no,INFO_ETC_SUB,INFO_ETC_VISIT,INFO_ETC_DATE,INFO_ETC_FILE,INFO_ETC_CONT,INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL from APART_INFO_ETC order by INFO_ETC_DATE desc )) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1)*#{limit}+1) and rnum <= (#{page} * #{limit})
mapper.update: update APART_INFO_ETC set INFO_ETC_VISIT = INFO_ETC_VISIT+1 where INFO_ETC_NUM=#{INFO_ETC_NUM}

update APART_INFO_ETC set INFO_ETC_SUB = #{INFO_ETC_SUB}, INFO_ETC_CONT = #{INFO_ETC_CONT}, INFO_ETC_FILE = #{INFO_ETC_FILE , jdbcType = VARCHAR}, INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL = #{INFO_ETC_ORIGINAL, jdbcType = VARCHAR} where INFO_ETC_NUM = #{INFO_ETC_NUM}
